case_title: USA v. Ron Jon Surf Shop
case_info_full_case_name: USA v. Ron Jon Surf Shop

charges.charge_description: 18:542.F ENTRY OF GOODS BY MEANS OF FALSE STATEMENTS (making false statements which deprived the US of lawful duties) (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Fine-$7,500.00 payable to USA due in 5 days; Special Assessment-$800.00; in lieu of restitution, defendant has paid a lump sum payment of $225,000.00 to US Customs Service

charges.charge_description: 18:1001.F STATEMENTS OR ENTRIES GENERALLY (making false statements on a prior disclosure submitted to the US Customs Service on [10/3/96]) (2)

charges.charge_disposition: Fine-$7,500.00 payable to USA due in 5 days; Special Assessment-$800.00; in lieu of restitution, defendant has paid a lump sum payment of $225,000.00 to US Customs Service
